page.title: 18PEOPLE-NATIVES OF BLEWBURY
page.content: MR.A.IS 69 YEARS OLD AND IS A NATIVE OF BLEWBURY.AT THE AGE OF 20,HE WAS CALLED UP IN THE ARMY AND SERVED AS DRIVER OF AN OPEN TOP TANK FOR 6 YEARS.AFTER THE WAR HE WORKED IN VARIOUS PLACES ON REPAIRING TRACTORS AND HOISTING EQUIPMENT.HE RETURNED TO BLEWBURY AFTER AN ABSENCE OF 40 YEARS,AND WORKED IN THE LOCAL GARAGE AND THEN BECAME CARETAKER AT BLEWBURY SCHOOL. MR.S.IS ALSO A NATIVE OF THE VILLAGE AND OWNS A FARM OF APPROX.120 ACRES.IT IS A MIXED FARM;HIS MAIN CROP IS CEREALS AND HE KEEPS CATTLE WHICH HE TAKES TO MARKET ABOUT 4 TIMES A YEAR.HE ALSO KEEPS SHEEP,PIGS AND GEESE(ABOUT 350 ANIMALS ALTOGETHER).MR.S.THINKS THAT THE VILLAGE IS VERY NICE AND THAT IT IS A VERY GOOD AND PRODUCTIVE AGRICULTURAL AREA.
